statements: SELECT * FROM BackupSchedule;
SELECT backup_id, schedule_time FROM BackupSchedule;
SELECT retention_policy FROM BackupSchedule ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BackupSchedule WHERE backup_id = 100;
SELECT backup_id, schedule_time, retention_policy FROM BackupSchedule WHERE retention_policy = '7 days';
SELECT * FROM BackupSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, retention_policy FROM BackupSchedule WHERE retention_policy LIKE '%7 days';
SELECT * FROM BackupSchedule ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT backup_id, retention_policy FROM BackupSchedule WHERE retention_policy = '14 days' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT MAX(backup_id) FROM BackupSchedule;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_schedule_id = 1;
SELECT backup_schedule_id, next_backup_date FROM backup_schedules WHERE retention_policy = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules ORDER BY next_backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_schedule_id, retention_policy FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_frequency = 'weekly';
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT backup_schedule_id, backup_frequency FROM backup_schedules WHERE retention_policy = 'monthly' ORDER BY next_backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_schedule_id, next_backup_date FROM backup_schedules WHERE retention_policy = 'weekly' AND backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM backup_schedules WHERE next_backup_date > NOW();
SELECT rs.policy_id, rs.backup_frequency, rp.retention_period FROM retention_policies rp JOIN backup_schedules rs ON rp.backup_frequency = rs.backup_frequency;
SELECT backup_schedule_id, retention_policy, DATE_FORMAT(next_backup_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_schedule_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name FROM backup_schedules ORDER BY schedule_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT log_id, backup_timestamp FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'success' ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_days FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_days > 30;
SELECT schedule_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT backup_frequency, schedule_name FROM backup_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT schedule_name, backup_frequency, next_backup_timestamp FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_frequency = 'weekly' ORDER BY schedule_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, backup_timestamp, backup_status FROM backup_logs WHERE schedule_id = 3 AND backup_status = 'successful';
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules;
SELECT id, schedule_name, next_backup FROM backup_schedules ORDER BY next_backup DESC;
SELECT backup_name, size_in_bytes FROM backups WHERE size_in_bytes > 100000;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > '30 days';
SELECT backup_name, log_message FROM backups JOIN backup_logs ON backups.id = backup_logs.backup_id;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules
SELECT schedule_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_schedules ORDER BY schedule_name ASC
SELECT id, schedule_name, next_backup FROM backup_schedules WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily'
SELECT b.backup_name, b.size_in_bytes, s.schedule_name, r.retention_period FROM backups b JOIN backup_schedules s ON b.schedule_id = s.id JOIN retention_policies r ON r.id = s.id
SELECT bl.log_timestamp, bl.log_message, b.backup_name FROM backup_logs bl JOIN backups b ON bl.backup_id = b.id ORDER BY bl.log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules ORDER BY backup_time DESC;
SELECT backup_name, frequency FROM backup_schedules WHERE retention_policy='Daily';
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status='Failed' ORDER BY backup_timestamp ASC;
SELECT backup_id, recovery_time, recovery_status FROM recovery_points WHERE recovery_status='Successful';
SELECT * FROM backup_schedules WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT backup_name, backup_time FROM backup_schedules WHERE retention_policy = '7 days';
SELECT b.backup_name, r.policy_name FROM backup_schedules b JOIN retention_policies r ON b.id = r.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_backups FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'success';
SELECT b.backup_name, e.error_description FROM backup_schedules b LEFT JOIN backup_errors e ON b.id = e.backup_id WHERE e.error_code IS NOT NULL;
